trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Kipeshpe is in need of a traveler with a little time to spare.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the freshly cut nopales and tuna to Nikawtenhe.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the freshly cut nopales and tuna to Tsanaya.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Kipeshpe.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_KIPESHPE_000_001<tab>Can't say I've seen you here before. A traveler passing through, I take it? Before you set off, would you be willing to lend me a hand?
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_KIPESHPE_000_003<tab>It's a simple thing, really. Just a small delivery of nopales and tuna.

TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_KIPESHPE_000_004<tab>Take these to Nikawtenhe at the saloon and Tsanaya by the rroneek stables. When you're finished, come back here, and I'll see if I can't put together a little something for your troubles.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_KIPESHPE_000_007<tab>You won't have to go far─just to the saloon and the rroneek stables. I promise to make it worth your time.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_NIKAWTENHE_000_015<tab>Welcome, friend. If you're looking to wet your whistle, I've got just the thing.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_NIKAWTENHE_000_016<tab>Why, this is the nopales and tuna I ordered! I certainly wasn't expecting you to be the one to deliver it.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_NIKAWTENHE_000_017<tab>If you've never tried them, I highly recommend it. Removing the needles can be something of a hassle, but nopales can be used for all sorts of cooking.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_NIKAWTENHE_000_018<tab>And the tuna can be used for desserts if you peel them, or squeezed to make juice.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_NIKAWTENHE_000_019<tab>Thank you for the quick delivery.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_TSANAYA_000_025<tab>Gods, am I thirsty...
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_TSANAYA_000_026<tab>For me? From the nopales farmer? His timing is impeccable as always.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_TSANAYA_000_027<tab>Water-laden as they are, nopales and tuna can be lifesavers when you're traveling about the wilds.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_TSANAYA_000_028<tab>Lucky for me, they make great feed for the rroneek, as well. My thanks for the delivery, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_NIKAWTENHE_000_029<tab>My thanks again to the farmer. There really is nothing more refreshing than fresh nopales and tuna.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_TSANAYA_000_030<tab>You'll not want for water on your travels with nopales in your satchel.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_KIPESHPE_000_035<tab>Your empty hands tell me you've finished making the deliveries.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_KIPESHPE_000_036<tab>And what did you think, seeing their elation for a delivery of fresh nopales? Pique your interest? Or maybe even worked up your appetite?
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_KIPESHPE_000_037<tab>You'll rarely find it eaten anywhere outside of the wilds, but someday, I hope to share the joys of nopales cuisine with all of Tural─no, the world!
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_KIPESHPE_000_038<tab>A far-fetched dream, perhaps, but so long as travelers like yourself happen to be passing through, that's one more person I can reach.
TEXT_KINGZE003_05121_KIPESHPE_000_039<tab>The next time your stomach growls with hunger, I hope you'll consider answering with fresh nopales.
